name: NeuroShield
description: A dynamic, adaptive cyber armor that shifts its color spectrum in real-time to counteract virtual attacks. The NeuroShield uses advanced neural interfaces to detect and neutralize incoming threats, providing both physical protection and digital shielding against data breaches or cyberattacks. Its holographic layer ensures minimal damage while maintaining structural integrity.

flavor.rationale: In a dystopian cyberpunk setting, NeuroShield would be essential for cyberwarriors who must protect themselves from both physical violence and virtual attacks. Its hybrid design merges traditional armor with cutting-edge technology, making it an irreplaceable tool in the fight against digital warfare.
